meanings.definition: To make or become smarter or more intelligent.
meanings.sent1: Reading books regularly smartens your mind.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard for exams can smarten up your knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The computer program smartens itself by learning from user interactions.
meanings.sent4: Experience is a great teacher that smartens us over time.
meanings.sent5: Learning new languages can smarten your brain like a workout for your mind.

meanings.definition: To improve in appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: Adding a few accessories can smarten up your outfit.
meanings.sent2: A fresh coat of paint can smarten the look of a room.
meanings.sent3: The tailor used his skills to smarten up the old suit.
meanings.sent4: The new haircut smartens her appearance instantly.
meanings.sent5: A good haircut can smarten up your whole look and boost your confidence.
